alert.note: Alert for Olmsted; Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 10:33AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Winona, central Olmsted and Wabasha Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1032 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Rochester, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail was reported by trained spotters near Rochester at 1030 am. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elgin around 1045 AM CDT. Plainview around 1055 AM CDT. Kellogg around 1110 AM CDT. Wabasha around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include South Troy, Pioneer Campground, Potsdam, West Albany, Kings Park, Rattlesnake Ridge, Bremen, Theilman and Maple Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
